resources.string: Unable to connect to the Internet
You can modify the application language by accessing the language settings within your phone\'s system configuration.

Welcome to our electricity price calculator app! 

 Our app provides you with up-to-date electricity price information for your current location, as well as other locations of your choosing. 

 With our easy-to-use interface, you can quickly access current and forecasted electricity price data, including the forecasted electricity price for different appliances, such as cooking/baking, showering, heating and using the washing machine. Our app is perfect for anyone who wants to check the electricity price and wants to plan their different activities around it. 

 Our app is optimized for both phone and tablet use. In addition to that, you can easily change the language to either Norwegian or English. 

 We hope you enjoy using our electricity price calculator app and that it helps you stay informed and prepared. 

 This app has been developed in collaboration with the Norwegian Meteorological Institute and as part of an exam assignment for IN2000 at the University of Oslo. 

 

 The project was undertaken by a team consisting of: 

 Kashmala Hafeez Sheikh, Osman Nasib Ali Ahmed, 

 Sakaria Abdi Ahmed, Sofia Ibn El Moujdi Troger, 

 Suleyman Mert Boyar and Syed Adam Hussainy"

The purpose of this app is to show the electricity price for a timeframe, and show the cost for common appliances during the different timeframes. 

 The home screen shows the current spot price for the user, while the electricity screen shows the electricity price for the current day and the chosen region. 

 The appliances screen shows the price of using the appliance that was chosen as a graph or a table. The settings screen provides you the oppurtunity to change the region, and gives you important information about this application.
